coveo:metadata.md_title: From Image to Insight: Using Machine Learning Tools for Smarter Analysis in High-Content Screening
coveo:metadata.md_eventdescription: Join us for this expert-led webinar, where Dr. Misha Bashkurov will explore how AI is redefining image and data analysis in high-content workflows.
Join the MPS World Summit to explore cutting-edge microphysiological systems, stem-cell tech, and global collaborations driving innovation in organ-on-a-chip research.
Join top scientists worldwide to share research, network, attend sessions, and explore innovations at this premier scientific event. Discover the best in the field!
Join an exclusive industry-focused forum to master complex in vitro models, enhance discovery & development workflows, and drive clinical translatability with confidence.

coveo:metadata.md_title: The Society of Biomolecular Imaging and Informatics (SBI2)
coveo:metadata.md_eventdescription: Join SBI2’s 13th anniversary event to explore cutting-edge imaging & informatics innovations. Connect with global experts advancing quantitative biological modeling.
Join LabDays Aarhus for two intensive days of networking, innovation, and insights for laboratory professionals. Discover the latest tech and trends in the lab industry.
Ilmac Basel is Switzerland’s leading event for the chemical & life science industry, showcasing innovations, trends, and networking opportunities in research and industry.
Molecular Devices presents innovative solutions for organoid culture, high-content imaging, and advanced biological data analysis on World Organoid Research Day.
Visit us at BPS 2026 to explore advanced biophysics solutions, including Axon electrophysiology, ImageXpress HCS.ai, and SpectraMax microplate readers.
Join us SOT 2026 to explore innovations in high-content imaging, multi-mode detection, and automated cell culture for advanced toxicology research.

coveo:metadata.md_title: Society for Laboratory Automation and Screening (SLAS)
coveo:metadata.md_eventdescription: Visit us at SLAS in Boston to explore cutting-edge lab automation technologies from Molecular Devices and Danaher that accelerate scientific discovery.

coveo:metadata.md_title: ImageXpress High-Content Imaging User Group Meeting
coveo:metadata.md_eventdescription: Join us in South San Francisco for an exclusive ImageXpress® High-Content Imaging User Meeting, focused on the latest advancements in high-content screening.
Join MSK 2025 in Suwon, Korea, Oct 26-28 at booth 48 to explore innovative solutions that streamline workflows, accelerate discovery, and enhance your research confidence.
Visit Booth 65 at LabDays Oslo 2025 to see how our end-to-end solutions streamline workflows, accelerate discovery, and boost research confidence.

coveo:metadata.md_title: Spanish & Portuguese Advanced Optical Microscopy Meeting (SPAOM)
coveo:metadata.md_eventdescription: Join us at SPAOM 2025 in Braga, Portugal, Nov 5-7 to explore imaging and analysis solutions that boost productivity, deepen insights, and accelerate discovery.
Join Europe’s largest biologics event in Basel—covering antibody therapies, cell and gene therapy, immunotherapy, and biosimilars from start to finish.
Join ELRIG Drug Discovery 2025 in Liverpool, Europe’s leading life sciences conference, featuring cutting-edge research, industry leaders, and a vibrant exhibition hall.
Join Cell Bio 2025, the ASCB & EMBO joint meeting, to explore groundbreaking science, network globally, and discover cutting-edge tools shaping the future of cell biology.
Join the largest bioprocessing event to accelerate biologics, cell & gene therapies. Gain insights, tech, and connections to optimize biopharma development & production.
Forum LABO, a CIFL event, unites laboratory professionals, researchers, and industry leaders to explore innovations in research, analysis, and scientific instrumentation.

coveo:metadata.md_title: 16th Göttingen Meeting of the German Neuroscience Society
coveo:metadata.md_eventdescription: Join Molecular Devices at the German Neuroscience Society Meeting to explore advanced imaging and analysis solutions for cutting-edge neuroscience research.
SLAS unites researchers and innovators in lab automation through conferences, publishing, education, and networking for scientific and career advancement.

coveo:metadata.md_title: SLAS (Society for Laboratory Automation and Screening)
coveo:metadata.md_carddescription: The Society for Laboratory Automation and Screening (SLAS) is an international professional society of academic, industry and government researchers as well as developers and providers of laboratory automation technology and tools.
coveo:metadata.md_eventdescription: Visit Molecular Devices at SLAS 2025 to explore the latest in lab automation, high-throughput screening, and innovative technologies for life science research.

coveo:metadata.md_carddescription: As science becomes increasingly interdisciplinary, the Biophysical Society Annual Meeting continues its long-held reputation for bringing together leading scientists from the all over the world who work at the interface of the life, physical, and computational sciences.
coveo:metadata.md_eventdescription: Visit Molecular Devices at BPS 2025 to discover advanced solutions for biophysics, structural biology, and high-performance molecular analysis.
Join Molecular Devices at SOT 2025 to discover advanced toxicology solutions, including high-throughput screening and human-relevant model technologies.
The AACR Annual Meeting brings together the global cancer research community to share cutting-edge advances in cancer science, medicine, and patient care.
Join us at SynBioBeta 2025 summit to explore cutting-edge technologies advancing synthetic biology, automation, and high-throughput workflows.
The Ilmac industry has its origins in the Swiss trade fair for international laboratory, measurement and automation technology in chemistry
LabDays are conducted over two intensive days for everyone working within the laboratory industry.
Visit WoTS 2024 and actively participate in the interactive trade fair projects and the appealing and current seminar program.

coveo:metadata.md_title: Advanced Imaging and Organoid Technologies User Meeting
coveo:metadata.md_eventdescription: Join Molecular Devices' User Meeting to explore the latest in advanced imaging, organoid technologies, and tools accelerating human-relevant model research.

Join Europe’s largest drug discovery conference in London, featuring scientific tracks on ageing mechanisms, cell and gene therapy, and more.
Join the ISSCR Annual Meeting scientific program where the year’s most significant new advances in stem cell research and regenerative medicine comprise.

coveo:metadata.md_title: FENS Forum 2024 (The Federation of European Neuroscience Societies)
coveo:metadata.md_eventdescription: Join Molecular Devices at FENS Forum 2024 to explore advanced imaging and analysis solutions driving neuroscience research and discovery.

coveo:metadata.md_title: ASGCT (American Society of Gene & Cell Therapy)
coveo:metadata.md_eventdescription: Join the American Society of Gene and Cell Therapy’s (ASGCT) Annual Meeting is the premier event for professionals in gene and cell therapy.

The AACR Annual Meeting highlights the work of the best minds in cancer research from institutions all over the world.
Analytica 2024 is an Europe's Leading Trade Fair for laboratory technology, analysis, biotechnology and analytica conference.
Join the UCD and Beckman University Biomanufacturing Symposium Institute to explore biomanufacturing trends, gain hands-on experience, and connect with experts.

coveo:metadata.md_title: French Society of Stem Cell Research Meeting 2024
coveo:metadata.md_eventdescription: The French Society of Stem Cell Research Meeting 2024 fosters collaboration and knowledge exchange among the French and international communities of stem cell researchers.
The Festival of Biologics brings together pharma & biotech, academics, and research institutes, together with their partners across the value chain.
